title: Carolina Panthers v Los Angeles Rams - NFC Wild Card
description: Bank of America Stadium was designed for fans of all ages. Please note that every child over the age of 12 months is required to have a game ticket to enter the stadium. Any child under the age of 12 months admitted without a ticket must share a seat with an accompanying adult. Please be aware that this event is subject to NFL flexible scheduling procedures. The date and time for some games may change from what is currently reflected on the schedule and from what may appear on the ticket. For more detailed information regarding scheduling for the 2025 NFL Season, please visit https://www.nfl.com/schedules/flexible-scheduling-procedures

title: Panthers VIP Tailgate Wild Card at South Lawn Village
description: The Ultimate Tailgate Experience for the 2025-26 Panthers Season Located in South Lawn directly NEXT to Bank of America Stadium If you are a diehard Panthers fan and you want a VIP tailgating experience, check out the Panthers VIP Tailgate game day experience. Open three hours prior to kickoff for Panthers and opposing team fans. Come watch the ESPN pre-game breakdown All food and drinks (bar) are included in price All you can eat premium food stations exclusively created by Food Network Celebrity Chef Aaron May Live DJ Music Xbox gaming area inside the Panthers VIP tailgate

title: Sherri Shepherd
description: VIP-MEET & GREET tickets are the first row of seats in front of the stage and it includes a picture with Sherri Shepherd after the show. Land & Sea Restaurant is located inside of Headliners for all food services 1 hour prior to the show and throughout the night. Please do not purchase tickets from secondary markets we will only honor tickets purchased through Ticketmaster for this show.

title: Registix Reserve Access NOT A Game Ticket - Panthers vs. Rams
description: THIS IS NOT A GAME TICKET. A separate game ticket is required to enter the stadium before entering The Registix Reserve. Enjoy an all-inclusive bar with craft cocktails, beer, wine, and numerous culinary options with premium entrees, snacks, and desserts. Get as close to the action as possible from field-side access. Watch players warm up steps away in pregame and feel the pulse of all the action throughout the game. The Registix Reserve can be accessed from when stadium gates open until (60) minutes after the game's conclusion.

title: Learning from Selma with the Levine Museum of the New South
description: Levine Museum of the New South invites you to a special screening and community discussion of Selma, the award-winning film that powerfully chronicles the 1965 Selma to Montgomery marches and Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.s leadership during one of the most pivotal moments of the Civil Rights Movement.

venue.name: The Carolina
venue.address: Carolina Theatre Charlotte Belk Place - 230 North Tryon

title: The Change Baker
description: A Small Bakery. A Powerful Movement. Set in a small Southern city, The ChangeBaker follows the story of Manolo Betancur, whose bakery in North Carolina became a sanctuary for immigrants and a frontline in the battle for justice following a series of ICE raids. What began as a pursuit of the American Dream transformed into something much greater: a hub of resilience, purpose, and activism. From Soldier to Bread Hero: Manolo arrived in the U.S. with a dream after fleeing the violence of war in Colombia. Today, he is the proud owner of the first Latin bakery in his city and the recipient of the World Bread Hero Award. His story is a tribute to those who rise before dawn to build a better nation, often unseen and uncelebrated. At the heart of the film is a simple but powerful message: Made in America by Immigrant Hands.
